text: Confocal microscopy was performed as previously described6 .
Briefly , cells were fixed with 4 % paraformaldehyde in PBS and then Cellspin mounted onto slides .

The fixed cells were then permeabilized with 0.05 % Triton X-100 in PBS and stained with FITC-conjugated rabbit anti-RPS3 antibodies ( Primm Biotech ) , or AlexaFluor 594-conjugated rat anti-Flag antibodies ( BD ) for 40 min together with 1 mug / ml of Hoechst 33342 ( Sigma ) for 5 min at 25 degreesC .
The slides were then rinsed with PBS three times and cover mounted for fluorescence microscopy .
